name: 2025 12th International Conference on Wireless Communication and Sensor Networks (icWCSN 2025)
content: PUBLICATION: The accepted papers will be included into Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Authors will be invited to deliver presentation on conference.
